resources.string: Wargames have became one of the most popular hobbies, a big part of which is assembly, painting and collecting miniatures.
Warlord.ru - the wargaming store, provides a wide variety of fantastic miniatures, accessories and tools as well as wargaming literature and terrains.
You want to learn how to play Warhammer? How to assemble and paint miniatures? You have found the right place!
We are open every day, 11 am to 11 pm.
